item.title: Attacking Wi-Fi networks with Aircrack-ng
item.author: Anthares101
item.description: Attacking Wi-Fi networks with Aircrack-ng Before starting, remember that performing any of the attacks explained in this post to networks without previous consent is illegal, this post information is for educational purposes only. Introduction Wi-Fi uses management frames (datagrams are called frames in this context) and data frames. Only data frames are encrypted and injecting them into the network will require a previous association with the AP. This is not necessary for management frames of if we send data frames spoofing some of the clients MAC addresses.
